body:
https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/cfd84a0135f63052ad394ea980812800f225e898/service/history/historyEngine.go#L196

This failure is not related to the request itself. So it shouldn't be InvalidArgument. I would change it to QueryFailed possibly adding more info into that structure.
title: ErrQueryWorkflowBeforeFirstDecision should not be "invalid argument" failure
